content: there was an error in the original download i have replaced it with an updated version witch hat i wanted a witch hat for my ren fest costume but couldn t find a pattern for the image i had in my head so i set about creating my own i hope you like this pattern the hat as written should fit a medium size head my head is 22 inches materials 5mm hook worsted weight yarn - i used red heart stripes in favorite stripe - one skein was enough to finish the entire hat jewelry wire - i think i used 18g or 20g - basically something sturdy enough to hold the brim up but not so thick that it s hard to work with scissors stitch marker needle for weaving in end the flower vine is the pattern flower fairy vines by claire olivia golden worked in rounds - top down - brim is joined with a slip_stitch at the end of every round
